IIndexedUniswapV2Oracle","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"categoryID","type":"uint256"}],"name":"orderCategoryTokensByMarketCap","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"owner","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"categoryID","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"indexSize","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"initialWethValue","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"string","name":"name","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"symbol","type":"string"}],"name":"prepareIndexPool","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"poolAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"initializerAddress","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"poolAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"reindexPool","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"renounceOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"poolAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"reweighPool","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint8","name":"_defaultSellerPremium","type":"uint8"}],"name":"setDefaultSellerPremium","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"poolAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"maxPoolTokens","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setMaxPoolTokens","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"poolAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"swapFee","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setSwapFee","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newOwner","type":"address"}],"name":"transferOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"categoryID","type":"uint256"}],"name":"updateCategoryPrices","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"contract IPool","name":"pool","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"updateMinimumBalance","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"tokenSeller","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"premiumPercent","type":"uint8"}],"name":"updateSellerPremium","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"d1ll0n","details":"This contract implements the market cap square root index management strategy. Index pools have a defined size which is used to select the top tokens from the pool's category. REBALANCING =============== Every 1 weeks, pools are either re-weighed or re-indexed. They are re-indexed once for every three re-weighs. Re-indexing involves selecting the top tokens from the pool's category and weighing them by the square root of their market caps. Re-weighing involves weighing the tokens which are already indexed by the pool by the square root of their market caps. When a pool is re-weighed, only the tokens with a desired weight above 0 are included. ===============","events":{"NewPoolInitializer(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a pool and its initializer are deployed. "},"PoolInitialized(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a pool is initialized and made public. "}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addToken(address,uint256)":{"details":"Adds a new token to a category. Note: A token can only be assigned to one category at a time."},"addTokens(uint256,address[])":{"details":"Add tokens to a category.","params":{"categoryID":"Category identifier.","tokens":"Array of tokens to add to the category."}},"computeAverageMarketCap(address)":{"details":"Compute the average market cap of a token in weth. Queries the average amount of ether that the total supply is worth using the recent moving average price."},"computeAverageMarketCaps(address[])":{"details":"Returns the average market cap for each token."},"computeInitializerAddress(address)":{"details":"Compute the create2 address for a pool initializer."},"computePoolAddress(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Compute the create2 address for a pool."},"computeSellerAddress(address)":{"details":"Compute the create2 address for a pool's unbound token seller."},"constructor":{"details":"Deploy the controller and configure the addresses of the related contracts."},"createCategory(bytes32)":{"details":"Creates a new token category.","params":{"metadataHash":"Hash of metadata about the token category which can be distributed on IPFS."}},"finishPreparedIndexPool(address,address[],uint256[])":{"details":"Initializes a pool which has been deployed but not initialized and transfers the underlying tokens from the initialization pool to the actual pool."},"getCategoryMarketCaps(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the fully diluted market caps for the tokens in a category."},"getCategoryTokens(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the array of tokens in a category."},"getInitialTokensAndBalances(uint256,uint256,uint144)":{"details":"Queries the top `indexSize` tokens in a category from the market oracle, computes their relative weights by market cap square root and determines the weighted balance of each token to meet a specified total value."},"getLastCategoryUpdate(uint256)":{"details":"Returns the timestamp of the last time the category was sorted."},"getTopCategoryTokens(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Get the top `num` tokens in a category. Note: The category must have been sorted by market cap in the last `MAX_SORT_DELAY` seconds."},"hasCategory(uint256)":{"details":"Returns a boolean stating whether a category exists."},"isTokenInCategory(uint256,address)":{"details":"Returns boolean stating whether `token` is a member of the category `categoryID`."},"orderCategoryTokensByMarketCap(uint256)":{"details":"Sorts a category's tokens in descending order by market cap. Note: Uses in-memory insertion sort.","params":{"categoryID":"Category to sort"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"prepareIndexPool(uint256,uint256,uint256,string,string)":{"details":"Deploys an index pool and a pool initializer. The initializer contract is a pool with specific token balance targets which gives pool tokens in the finished pool to users who provide the underlying tokens needed to initialize it."},"reindexPool(address)":{"details":"Re-indexes a pool by setting the underlying assets to the top tokens in its category by market cap."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"reweighPool(address)":{"details":"Reweighs the assets in a pool by market cap and sets the desired new weights, which will be adjusted over time."},"setDefaultSellerPremium(uint8)":{"details":"Sets the default premium rate for token seller contracts."},"setMaxPoolTokens(address,uint256)":{"details":"Sets the maximum number of pool tokens that can be minted for a particular pool. This value will be used in the alpha to limit the maximum damage that can be caused by a catastrophic error. It can be gradually increased as the pool continues to not be exploited. If it is set to 0, the limit will be removed.","params":{"maxPoolTokens":"Maximum LP tokens the pool can mint.","poolAddress":"Address of the pool to set the limit on."}},"setSwapFee(address,uint256)":{"details":"Sets the swap fee on an index pool."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updateCategoryPrices(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the prices on the oracle for all the tokens in a category."},"updateMinimumBalance(address,address)":{"details":"Updates the minimum balance of an uninitialized token, which is useful when the token's price on the pool is too low relative to external prices for people to trade it in."},"updateSellerPremium(address,uint8)":{"details":"Set the premium rate on `sellerAddress` to the given rate."}},"title":"MarketCapSqrtController","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/MarketCapSqrtController.sol":"MarketCapSqrtController"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"@indexed-finance/proxies/contracts/CodeHashes.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2c82d565ac205e9f0de57beba110dc60a816baf11d95a5bfa7a86f5bc93100d9","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://6ff1117b88b6ff6e43e634f2d0ac398da58c55bd434a2af3b470795d3aa90ab3","dweb:/ipfs/QmVG71LRUcYwmTNHS2ZJccd8uFqKPCYXt4ahCkRKDHfUvd"]},"@indexed-finance/proxies/contracts/SaltyLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdd4f18bcfc3f0761c822c079c2b8177f317edd40c84f85c77fa07a1827b1796b","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://ef7e1818cb47a6ff6ab364162f051d6a3444eb8438015259a71fefd547ccb98e","dweb:/ipfs/QmV2gNBns5YTiF2ENEf7B5SZNUeC6Thw89jGECUoRG5FnN"]},"@indexed-finance/proxies/contracts/interfaces/IDelegateCallProxyManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x24f7aa01dd4c8592b889d6d81badd244ad9e602232406be5941413418d171421","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://3edfca6e8b608f4e4fd2c86a3eb3146202f9bfd7f26ff4608172894313ea911d","dweb:/ipfs/QmdSvcGykCzAgfkyzofX6DEwbtFnAtjtnb9KddA7YJVtHZ"]},"@indexed-finance/uniswap-v2-oracle/contracts/interfaces/IIndexedUniswapV2Oracle.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfebe2d6eb9d0a456cc8ef805b011d429de0eb206a90d99755262fded86f3ed95","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://5ea99a71a45f955dce629d887f44136477b6775ea3301e64d21b61154ee450fa","dweb:/ipfs/QmcEbyAmyuZLAQUUhoexN4ZiLeMegRJAZMeCBtK31PZ2VF"]},"@indexed-finance/uniswap-v2-oracle/contracts/lib/FixedPoint.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb55e5d7cba20c7c72b497f0553d1f7297a06b02b74c775c1de722a4975c38733","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://753f4e3e1d7e414ab3fa8a924580a53e068469cc7e2822c11e1a15d9742385a3","dweb:/ipfs/QmSNCV5vfdq8A9iVmzLyJGuz6FDXAm3NAyuuahmeacHXUX"]},"@indexed-finance/uniswap-v2-oracle/contracts/lib/PriceLibrary.sol":{"kec devdoc.author: d1ll0n
devdoc.details: This contract implements the market cap square root index management strategy. Index pools have a defined size which is used to select the top tokens from the pool's category. REBALANCING =============== Every 1 weeks, pools are either re-weighed or re-indexed. They are re-indexed once for every three re-weighs. Re-indexing involves selecting the top tokens from the pool's category and weighing them by the square root of their market caps. Re-weighing involves weighing the tokens which are already indexed by the pool by the square root of their market caps. When a pool is re-weighed, only the tokens with a desired weight above 0 are included. ===============

NewPoolInitializer(address,address,uint2.details: Emitted when a pool and its initializer are deployed.

PoolInitialized(address,address,uint256,.details: Emitted when a pool is initialized and made public.

addToken(address,uint256).details: Adds a new token to a category. Note: A token can only be assigned to one category at a time.

params.tokens: Array of tokens to add to the category.

computeAverageMarketCap(address).details: Compute the average market cap of a token in weth. Queries the average amount of ether that the total supply is worth using the recent moving average price.

computeAverageMarketCaps(address[]).details: Returns the average market cap for each token.

computeInitializerAddress(address).details: Compute the create2 address for a pool initializer.

computePoolAddress(uint256,uint256).details: Compute the create2 address for a pool.

computeSellerAddress(address).details: Compute the create2 address for a pool's unbound token seller.

constructor.details: Deploy the controller and configure the addresses of the related contracts.

params.metadataHash: Hash of metadata about the token category which can be distributed on IPFS.

finishPreparedIndexPool(address,address[.details: Initializes a pool which has been deployed but not initialized and transfers the underlying tokens from the initialization pool to the actual pool.

getCategoryMarketCaps(uint256).details: Returns the fully diluted market caps for the tokens in a category.

getCategoryTokens(uint256).details: Returns the array of tokens in a category.

getInitialTokensAndBalances(uint256,uint.details: Queries the top `indexSize` tokens in a category from the market oracle, computes their relative weights by market cap square root and determines the weighted balance of each token to meet a specified total value.

getLastCategoryUpdate(uint256).details: Returns the timestamp of the last time the category was sorted.

getTopCategoryTokens(uint256,uint256).details: Get the top `num` tokens in a category. Note: The category must have been sorted by market cap in the last `MAX_SORT_DELAY` seconds.

hasCategory(uint256).details: Returns a boolean stating whether a category exists.

isTokenInCategory(uint256,address).details: Returns boolean stating whether `token` is a member of the category `categoryID`.

orderCategoryTokensByMarketCap(uint256).details: Sorts a category's tokens in descending order by market cap. Note: Uses in-memory insertion sort.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

prepareIndexPool(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Deploys an index pool and a pool initializer. The initializer contract is a pool with specific token balance targets which gives pool tokens in the finished pool to users who provide the underlying tokens needed to initialize it.

reindexPool(address).details: Re-indexes a pool by setting the underlying assets to the top tokens in its category by market cap.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

reweighPool(address).details: Reweighs the assets in a pool by market cap and sets the desired new weights, which will be adjusted over time.

setDefaultSellerPremium(uint8).details: Sets the default premium rate for token seller contracts.

setMaxPoolTokens(address,uint256).details: Sets the maximum number of pool tokens that can be minted for a particular pool. This value will be used in the alpha to limit the maximum damage that can be caused by a catastrophic error. It can be gradually increased as the pool continues to not be exploited. If it is set to 0, the limit will be removed.

params.maxPoolTokens: Maximum LP tokens the pool can mint.
params.poolAddress: Address of the pool to set the limit on.

setSwapFee(address,uint256).details: Sets the swap fee on an index pool.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateCategoryPrices(uint256).details: Updates the prices on the oracle for all the tokens in a category.

updateMinimumBalance(address,address).details: Updates the minimum balance of an uninitialized token, which is useful when the token's price on the pool is too low relative to external prices for people to trade it in.

updateSellerPremium(address,uint8).details: Set the premium rate on `sellerAddress` to the given rate.

devdoc.title: MarketCapSqrtController
